canonical.body:
WTF | Welcome To Florida

Cape Coral's Most Unique Kava & Wellness Destination

What The Florida is this amazing place?! We're your neighborhood kava bar serving premium kava, kratom, hemp products, and good vibes in the heart of Cape Coral. Come discover why we're Southwest Florida's favorite!

🛍️ Shop All Products 📞 Call (239) 955-0314 🗺️ Visit Us Today

What The Florida Makes Us Special?

We're not your typical corporate kava chain. We're Cape Coral natives serving our community with authentic Florida hospitality and premium products.

🏠

Cape Coral Born & Raised

We're not some corporate chain - we're your neighbors! Born and raised in Cape Coral, we understand our community and serve it with authentic Florida pride.

🧪

Lab-Tested Quality

Every single product is third-party lab tested for purity, potency, and safety. From kava to kratom to hemp - we never compromise on quality.

🌿

Diverse Selection

More than just kava! We offer kratom, hemp products, specialty tea blends, beverages, and unique items you won't find anywhere else in Southwest Florida.

Featured Products

Check out some of our most popular items - perfect for first-time visitors and seasoned customers alike!

🥥 Premium Kava

Traditional Pacific Island relaxation. Perfect for unwinding, socializing, and finding your calm.

Shop Kava →

🍃 Quality Kratom

Energy, focus, and mood enhancement. Including our popular White Rabbit and Tea Time brands.

Shop Kratom →

🌿 Hemp & THC

Federally legal Delta-9 THC products. Veed syrups, Barney's edibles, and more!

Shop Hemp →

🍵 WTF Tea Blends

NEW! Blue Dreams Tea and Love Potion Tea - unique kratom blends you won't find anywhere else!

Try Our Blends →
🛍️ Shop All Products

Visit Cape Coral's Premier Kava Bar

Come experience the WTF difference in person! Relax, socialize, work remotely, or just hang out. We're more than a store - we're your neighborhood gathering place.

🏪 Our Cape Coral Location

1520 SE 46th Ln. Unit B, Cape Coral, FL 33904

Hours:
Monday - Friday: 12:00 PM - 10:00 PM
Saturday - Sunday: 12:00 PM - 11:00 PM

Phone: (239) 955-0314
Email: info@wtfswag.com

📞 Call Now 🗺️ Get Directions 📍 Learn More

Why Cape Coral Chooses WTF

🤝

Real Relationships

We know our customers by name, not order number. Come be part of our Florida family!

📚

Expert Guidance

New to kava or kratom? Our knowledgeable staff educates and guides you to the perfect experience.

🏆

Community First

We support local causes and give back to the Cape Coral community that supports us.

⚡

Convenient Options

Shop online for pickup, visit us in-store, or call ahead. We make it easy to get what you need.

Ready to Experience WTF?

Whether you're a kava veteran or completely new to natural wellness, we're here to help you discover what makes Cape Coral's favorite kava bar so special. Come see what the Florida fuss is all about!

🛍️ Start Shopping 📞 Call Us Now

canonical.body:
Welcome To Florida

Cape Coral's Most Unique Kava & Hemp Destination

OUR MISSION

ELEVATED EXPERIENCES

We serve the finest all-natural kava, premium kratom, and Farm Bill compliant hemp products. Hand-crafted with the highest quality ingredients and lab-tested for your peace of mind.

We WELCOME everyone to celebrate life, share stories, and discover new experiences. Whether you're here for a moment or a lifetime, you're part of our Florida family.

🌴 FLORIDA CRAFTED

Born and raised in Cape Coral, serving Southwest Florida with pride and authenticity.

🧪 LAB TESTED

Every product is third-party tested for purity, potency, and safety. Quality you can trust.

🤝 COMMUNITY FIRST

More than a business - we're your neighbors, supporting local causes and building connections.

📚 EDUCATION FOCUSED

We believe in informed choices. Our team educates and guides you to the perfect experience.

What Makes WTF Different?

  • Diverse Selection: Kava, kratom, hemp, edibles, and beverages all in one place
  • Local Expertise: Cape Coral natives who understand our community
  • Hybrid Experience: Shop online, pick up in-store, or hang out and enjoy
  • Real Relationships: We know our customers by name, not just order number
  • Florida Authentic: No corporate chains - just genuine Florida hospitality

Searching "Kava Bars Near Me"?

You Found Southwest Florida's Best!

WTF | Welcome To Florida is your local answer to "where can I find kava bars near me?" Located in Cape Coral, we serve all of Southwest Florida with premium kava, kratom, and natural wellness products.

📍 Your Local Kava Bar Location

WTF | Welcome To Florida

1520 SE 46th Ln. Unit B, Cape Coral, FL 33904

Monday - Friday: 12:00 PM - 10:00 PM
Saturday - Sunday: 12:00 PM - 11:00 PM

📞 Call Now 🗺️ Get Directions

🔍 Why Choose Our Kava Bar?

  • Locally Owned: Cape Coral natives serving our community
  • Premium Quality: Lab-tested kava, kratom, and hemp products
  • Expert Staff: Knowledgeable guidance for all experience levels
  • Diverse Selection: More than just kava - kratom, hemp, teas, and more
  • Convenient Hours: Open daily with flexible pickup options

🌿 What We Offer

  • Traditional Kava: Pacific Island relaxation and social enhancement
  • Premium Kratom: Energy, focus, and mood enhancement
  • Hemp Products: Legal Delta-9 THC edibles and beverages
  • Specialty Blends: Unique teas like Blue Dreams and Love Potion
  • Beverages: Syrups, sodas, and refreshing drinks

🏆 Southwest Florida's Favorite Kava Destination

When locals search "kava bars near me," they choose WTF | Welcome To Florida because we're more than just a kava bar - we're a community gathering place where quality meets authenticity. Unlike corporate chains, we know our customers by name and provide personalized recommendations based on your preferences and experience level.

canonical.title: Natural Wellness Guide | Kava, Kratom & Hemp Education
canonical.bodySummary: Your Guide to Natural Wellness Discover the benefits of kava, kratom, and hemp products with expert guidance from Cape Coral's trusted source. 🥥 KA...
canonical.body:
Your Guide to Natural Wellness

Discover the benefits of kava, kratom, and hemp products with expert guidance from Cape Coral's trusted source.

🥥 KAVA

CALM + SOCIAL

Traditional Pacific Island beverage known for its relaxing properties. Perfect for unwinding after work or socializing with friends.

  • Natural muscle relaxation
  • Stress relief without impairment
  • Social enhancement
  • Non-addictive alternative

"Try our kava flights to discover your favorite variety!"

🍃 KRATOM

ENERGY + FOCUS

Southeast Asian botanical with energizing and mood-enhancing properties. Popular among professionals and active individuals.

  • White Strains: Energy & Focus
  • Green Strains: Balanced Effects
  • Red Strains: Relaxation & Calm
  • Lab-tested for purity

"Our White Rabbit and Tea Time products are customer favorites!"

🌿 HEMP & THC

RELAX + ENJOY

Farm Bill compliant Delta-9 THC products including edibles, beverages, and syrups. All legal and lab-tested.

  • Federally legal Delta-9 THC
  • Precise dosing for consistency
  • Variety of flavors and formats
  • Third-party lab tested

"Start low, go slow - our staff will guide your experience!"

Why Choose WTF for Your Wellness Journey?

🧪 Quality Assurance

Every product is third-party lab tested for purity, potency, and safety.

👨‍🏫 Expert Guidance

Our knowledgeable staff helps you find the perfect product for your needs.

🏪 Local Convenience

Cape Coral location with online ordering and same-day pickup available.

🤝 Community Trust

Locally owned and operated, supporting our Southwest Florida community.

Ready to Start Your Wellness Journey?

Visit us in Cape Coral for personalized guidance and premium products.

🛍️ Shop All Products 📞 Call for Guidance
